title: Paradise for a Sinner
description: When Samoan cornerback Adam Malala and two children in need show up at Joe Dean Billodeaux's house on the first day of the off season, Joe knows he isn't going to get any relief. Adam, jilted by his island fiancee, has no desire to go home until he meets Winnie Green, a nurse called in to help the abandoned little boy. When the chaos of Joe's place becomes too much for them, Adam and Winnie take off for American Samoa and an unexpected adventure awaiting them there.
author: Lynn Shurr
